about_the_game:
IMPORTANT NOTE:
VR SUPPORT IS CURRENTLY LIMITED TO OCULUS QUEST 2 ONLY. THE GAME STILL CAN BE LAUNCHED AS A STANDARD PROGRAM ON COMPUTERS AND LAPTOPS, WITHOUT USING A VR DEVICE.



Femdom Waifu VR is a successor to the original Femdom Waifu JOI (Jerk Off Instruction) game, where the player is controlled by a cruel dominatrix. Make no mistake, this is much more than just a sequel. This is a huge technical leap forward from the original. The step we've all dreamed about:

This time your Mistress will own you in full 3D.

Features:
■ Built for VR. Although Femdom Waifu VR works on a regular monitor, getting the full experience requires using your Oculus Quest 2 for maximum immersion.
■ Full Voiceover. That's right. Not just moans and giggles or the occasional word. Every! Single! Line! Let her voice bless your ears as you ruin yourself for your Mistress.
■ Improved Session System. Shorter timers and more varied patterns to keep the game exciting session after session.
■ A dynamic game with lust, pain and frustration. What you want will never matter to her, so be prepared to suffer.
■ Worshipping your mistress, obeying her commands. She's so much more than you deserve, so remember to be grateful for her time.
■ Lots of stroking, edging and verbal abuse. Exactly what you want and need.
■ Different outcomes. She decides whether you'll ruin your orgasm, cum or be totally denied. Wanted a different result? Just try again, if you think you can take another session. Or are you too weak?
■ Erotic humiliation, kinky tasks and hours of masochistic pleasure. More than 500 lines read by a professional voice actress to elevate your JOI experience to new heights.
■ Made with love. As always.

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: This game contains hardcore femdom elements. The player will be provided with instructions directing to masturbate in a submissive way, which includes topics like: humiliation, orgasm denial, chastity play, spanking, etc.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 16:9 aspect ratio
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
